module: Module-level comment: The 'Processor' module serves as a digital signal processor, adjusting ADC and DAC offsets in a data signal. Inputs are 'sysclk' (clock signal) & 'data_in' (10-bit wide data); Output is 'data_out' (10-bit wide processed data). An 'assign' block computes 'x' ('data_in' - 'ADC_OFFSET') & 'y' (='x'). An 'always' block, on each 'sysclk' positive edge, adds 'y' & 'DAC_OFFSET', updating 'data_out'. Thus, offset-adjusted data is written to 'data_out'.
